features: Dual action hardworking formula powers away 48-hour stuck-on food and fights tough stains
0% synthetic fragrances, dyes, chlorine bleach, or phosphates
Convenient single dose dishwasher packs, just toss right into the dishwasher
Septic safe, biodegradable, and USDA Certified Biobased Product 80%
Dishwasher packs come in an 70ct Tub designed for compact, easy storage
body.description: Have a tough job? We have an easy answer. Seventh Generation Ultra Power Plus Dishwasher Detergent Packs feature our powerful grease-fighting formula to leave your dishes with a sparkling, streak-free shine. This dish detergent’s hardworking enzymes power away 48-hour stuck-on food, while oxygen bleach fights tough stains – all without the use of synthetic fragrances, dyes, phosphates, or chlorine bleach. Our single dose dishwasher packs come in a dissolvable PVA film that can be tossed right in the dishwasher for a hassle-free alternative to traditional powders and gels – no need to unwrap or measure. Because when things get messier, you shouldn’t have to work harder. That’s our job. For more than 25 years, Seventh Generation has been thoughtfully formulating Safe.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Enzyme-rich Dishwasher Detergent Packs formula Dishwasher Detergent power that cuts through tough grease and food residue to leave dishes sparkling clean When life is busy, don’t let messes slow you down. Seventh Generation dish detergent packs offer a convenient and powerful clean that blasts through tough residue to leave your dishes streak-free with just one wash, no pre-rinse necessary. Our single dose dishwasher tabs come in a dissolvable PVA film that can be tossed right into the dishwasher for a hassle-free alternative to traditional powders and gels – no need to unwrap or measure. 90% Plastic-Free Packaging! Recyclable Paper Box Leaping Bunny Certified USDA Biobased Certified Product 79% B Corp Certified Safer Choice Certified

The Right Amount Every Time A convenient single dose dishwasher pack, ready to toss right into the dishwasher and available in an easy to use resealable pouch or tub! NEW 90% Plastic Free Packaging NEW, our Dishwasher Detergent Packs now have 90% Plastic Free Packaging, helping our mission to transform the world into a healthy, sustainable, and equitable place for the next seven generations. Powerful Clean Enzyme rich formula cuts through tough grease and food residue to leave dishes sparkling clean!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Cleans well, environmentally safe, and I will buy again shortly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: While the packaging could be better the product works fine compared to any other dishwasher pack I've used. I would recommend this to a friend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Plant Based Dishwasher Pods
reviews.reviewText: They do what they are supposed to do and don't leave any streaks or residue!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Strange... doesn't make sense
reviews.reviewText: I switched from Finish dishwasher tabs to this hoping they would be as good on dishes. For some reason every time I was a salad bowl some pieces of lettuce goes they all the cycles and stays. Although the dried up flaky lettuce is clean it's not the ideal outcome. I'll probably go back to Finish.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are my go-to dishwasher pods. I try to be as environmentally friendly as possible while still being efficient and getting great results. These pods check all the boxes. My dishes come out sparkling every. single. time! Definitely worth the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seventh Generation Dishwasher Detergent Packs
reviews.reviewText: I've been buying these forever because I think they are the best, I buy them in this mega-pack because they are a better value than buying the smaller packages at the store.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars La la la la (Singing praises)
reviews.reviewText: WOW! These pods are great!EVERY time, no matter how short the cycle, my dishes are SPARKLING CLEAN without annoying odors or environmental harm! Why does anyone use anything else? It took all the corrosion off a much-used copper cup, the first time. This is something other detergents didn't due with multiple washings.I have this as a subscribe and save item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love that this has less “extra” stuff when compared to the more mainstream cleaners. I don’t tend to do too much “pre-cleaning” before putting dishes in the dishwasher, but they always come out perfect. Highly recommend.
